alert.note: Alert for Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 21 at 5:09PM MDT until May 22 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches along and north of highway 24, 2 to 4 inches across southern Teller county. * WHERE...Teller County...Rampart Range Above 7500 Feet and Pikes Peak. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slick and slushy roads at times, especially over southern portions of the area. Additional snow loading may break tree limbs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
